package step1;

class Yard {
	float  length,width;
	public Yard(int length, int width) {
		// TODO Auto-generated constructor stub
		this.length=length;
		this.width=width;
	}
	public String getPerimeter() {
		String b =String.valueOf(2*(length+width));
		return b;
	}
	public String getAcreage() {
		String c =String.valueOf(length*width);
		return c;
	}
	
}
